trans-unit.source: An activity used to explicitly invoke the compensation handler of a <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"></xref> class.

Gets or sets the <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"></xref> activity.

When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activity explicitly invokes the compensation handler of <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, which returns the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>.

When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is not specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activity invokes the default compensation for any child <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> activities in the reverse order of successful completion.

An <xref:System.> InvalidOperationException?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is thrown if the Target refers to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> that was previously confirmed or compensated.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
A <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"></xref>.
